data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Alto Paraná, Paraguay.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alto Paraná, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 618,300 citizens of Alto Paraná, Paraguay, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary: On average, 33 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Alto Paraná, Paraguay.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, remind your church in Alto Paraná that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 49,543 believers in Alto Paraná to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Alto Paraná with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 541,521 people in the state of Alto Paraná who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Alto Paraná.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

location.name: Alto Paraná
location.cities_list: Ciudad del Este, Foz do Iguaçu, Presidente Franco, Puerto Iguazú
